title: Inbound SMS Campaign Performance
body:
Inbound SMS Campaign Performance¶

Performance keeps a record of interactions with the inbound SMS campaign.

  1. Click in the ribbon

  2. Click Campaigns

  3. Click Inbound SMS

  4. Click on an inbound SMS campaign

  5. Click Performance

  6. Click the numbers under Sessions, Active, and Converted to see the contacts who enrolled in the workflow (initiated the campaign), are currently in the workflow, and were converted

    • You can also view the percent of enrolled contacts who have been converted under Conversion Rate

  7. Click the numbers to the right of each row to view the ??? who engaged in a certain action (the email was sent, opened, forwarded, etc.)??
toc: • Inbound SMS Campaign Performance
